title: Yasuo Passive Consistancy
body:
I made this thread on GD, but since GD gets no spotlight, I have to remake it here.


If a Siege Minion can proc Pantheon's shield block, they should be able to remove Yasuo's passive too.

The other way can be valid as well, remove the ability for siege minions to proc Pantheon's shield block.

replies.body: I think the reason they made it that way is that Pantheons Shield Block is up wayyyy more often than Yasuos windshield

Removing siege minion procing Panth shield would work, the other way around wouldn't as it would make Yasuos shield useless early game(what it was designed for).

But then we have to make Yasuo shield proc on turret hits like Panth shield, which will make Yasuo an OP turret diver.

Also we need to make Yasuo gain the shield quicker since Pantheon gains it 3-4 times during 1 fight, Yasuo will get it once or twice with his ult.


So don't compare 2 abilities that are actually pretty different.
